item.title: Israel and Hamas are close to reaching a cease-fire agreement
item.description: Negotiators in Qatar are close to a ceasefire deal that envisions an exchange of Israeli hostages for Palestinian detainees, a six-week pause in fighting and eventual withdrawal of troops from Gaza in the final phase.

item.title: A tortoise survival tale: How Tiptoe escaped Southern California's wildfires
item.description: For years, Tiptoe has been a beloved sight in Pacific Palisades, quietly tromping along sidewalks and growing a major social media following. But last week, he lost his home to wildfires.
